category.name: zoo.window.bonus
category.item: Do you have a ZooMumba bonus code? Simply enter it here and receive your bonus right away!
Great, you entered the bonus code correctly and received your reward. We wish you lots of fun!

category.name: zoo.window.bonus.error
category.item: Unfortunately, the bonus code is incorrect. Please check the code and try again.
You’ve already claimed this bonus code.
You’ve entered the bonus code incorrectly too many times. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
